```{r import data}
require(readr)
require(dplyr)
require(tidyverse)

final_data_bystate <- read_csv("data/new_data/final_data_bystate.csv")
final_data_bystate <- final_data_bystate %>% unite(period, c("year", "months"))
data = final_data_bystate %>% select(period, state, colony_lost_pct)

data = data %>% tidyr::pivot_wider(
  names_from = state, 
  values_from = colony_lost_pct,
  values_fill = NULL
)

data = data %>% remove_rownames %>% column_to_rownames(var="period")
```

```{r}
library(BNPTSclust)

output <- tseriescm(data,maxiter=4000,level=FALSE,trend=TRUE,
                           seasonality=TRUE,priorb=FALSE,b=0)
```

```{r}
clusterplots(output,data)
diagplots(output)
```
